text: Philosophische Studien (Philosophical Studies) was the first journal of experimental psychology founded by Wilhelm Wundt in 1881. The journal was succeeded by the Archiv für die gesamte Psychologie in 1903. ==References== ==External links== * Philosophische Studien, completely digitised in the Virtual Laboratory of the Max Planck Institute for the History of Science Category:1883 establishments in Germany Category:Experimental psychology journals Category:German-language journals Category:Publications established in 1883 Category:Publications with year of disestablishment missing Category:History of psychology Category:Defunct journals
title: Philosophische Studien
